title: ABBA - Waterloo (Official Music Video)
description:
REMASTERED IN HD! UP TO 4K!!
Get the ‘Waterloo’ Anniversary Collection now: https://abba.lnk.to/SHOPABBA
Listen to more music by ABBA: https://abba.lnk.to/musicID

Follow ABBA:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ABBA/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abba/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/abba
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@abba 
Read More About ABBA: http://www.abbasite.com/

Video produced by: Lasse Hallström

#ABBA #Waterloo #Remastered

Lyrics:

My, my, at Waterloo Napoleon did surrender 
oh yeah, and I have met my destiny 
in quite a similar way 
the history book on the shelf 
is always repeating itself 

Waterloo – I was defeated, you won the war 
Waterloo – promise to love you for ever more 
Waterloo – couldn’t escape if I wanted to 
Waterloo – knowing my fate is to be with you 
Wa, wa, wa, wa, Waterloo – finally facing my Waterloo 

My, my, I tried to hold you back but you were stronger 
oh yeah, and now it seems my only chance 
is giving up the fight 
and how could I ever refuse 
I feel like I win when I lose 

Waterloo – I was defeated, you won the war 
Waterloo – promise to love you for ever more 
Waterloo – couldn’t escape if I wanted to 
Waterloo – knowing my fate is to be with you 
Wa, wa, wa, wa, Waterloo – finally facing my Waterloo 

So how could I ever refuse 
I feel like I win when I lose – 

Waterloo – couldn’t escape if I wanted to 
Waterloo – knowing my fate is to be with you 
Wa, wa, wa, wa, Waterloo – finally facing my Waterloo 

(Benny Andersson, Björn Ulvaeus and Stig Anderson)
© 1974 Polar Music International AB
Published by: Universal/Union Songs AB

#ABBA

meta_title: ABBA - Waterloo (Official Remastered HD Music Video)
meta_description: Watch ABBA's iconic "Waterloo" music video remastered in HD. Celebrate this classic hit with the official video and more ABBA music.
meta_keywords: ABBA, Waterloo, official music video, remastered HD, 70s music, Eurovision, Agnetha, Anni-Frid, Benny, Björn
new_description:
ABBA - Waterloo: A Timeless Classic Reimagined in HD

The iconic song "Waterloo" by ABBA is more than just a pop classic; it marks a significant moment in music history. Released in 1974, "Waterloo" won the Eurovision Song Contest and catapulted ABBA into international fame. The song's catchy melody and memorable lyrics encapsulate the essence of 70s pop music, making it a timeless hit.

The official music video for "Waterloo", directed by Lasse Hallström, has now been remastered in HD, bringing the vibrant energy of the band and their performance closer to today's audiences. With improvements in sound and visual clarity, viewers can enjoy the music video like never before, rediscovering what made ABBA a global sensation.

A Historical Triumph

"Waterloo" was written by the iconic ABBA members Benny Andersson, Björn Ulvaeus, and Stig Anderson. The track cleverly references the historical Battle of Waterloo where Napoleon met his defeat, drawing parallels with a personal romantic surrender. This blend of historical context and personal storytelling is part of what gives the song its enduring appeal.

The song's triumph at Eurovision was a pivotal moment for ABBA. Performing the track live, they captivated the audience with their charismatic stage presence and unmatched harmony, setting the stage for their worldwide success.

The Band Behind the Magic

ABBA, consisting of Agnetha Fältskog, Anni-Frid Lyngstad, Benny Andersson, and Björn Ulvaeus, have been celebrated not only for their catchy tunes but also for their innovation in music production and video presentation. Each member brought unique talents to the group, contributing to their broad appeal and diverse sound.

The music video for "Waterloo" is a testament to the band's creative vision, showcasing their playful yet sophisticated style. The HD remastering allows both longtime fans and new listeners to experience the classic video with fresh detail and color.

Legacy of the Song

Since its initial release, "Waterloo" has not only maintained its popularity but also influenced many artists and appeared in various media. From movies like "Muriel's Wedding" and "The Simpsons" to cover performances, the track's influence is widespread across different cultures and generations.

Moreover, ABBA's music consistently finds new audiences, ensuring their hits never fade from public consciousness. Platforms like TikTok and Instagram introduce ABBA's timeless sound to younger listeners, furthering their legacy in the digital age.

Celebrating the Remaster

The remastering of the "Waterloo" video to 4K quality not only enhances the viewing experience but celebrates the ongoing relevance of ABBA's work. Fans can now relish the sparkly outfits, dynamic performance, and vibrant energy of the band in stunning clarity.

This project also serves as a reminder of ABBA's pioneering role in the music industry's visual presentation evolution. It reflects a time when artists began to see music videos as an extension of their artistry, something ABBA excelled at with their unique flair and creativity.

Explore More ABBA

In addition to "Waterloo," ABBA has a catalog of hits worth exploring. Fans can delve into their greatest hits album "ABBA Gold" or experience albums that reflect their evolution as artists. Each track is a journey through melody, storytelling, and the distinct sound that only ABBA can provide.

For those who wish to stay connected with the band, following ABBA on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter is a great way to keep up with their ongoing projects and releases.

As "Waterloo" continues to captivate audiences worldwide, its place in music history remains unchallenged. With the remastered video, both devoted fans and newcomers alike can celebrate the brilliance of ABBA in the clarity and vibrance that contemporary technology allows.
